#settings

= Settings =

  * *URL_WWW*
    The URL to your media-files:
    Default: settings.MEDIA_URL + 'uploads/'

  * *URL_ADMIN*
    The !FileBrowser Admin-URL.
    Default: /admin/filebrowser/

  * *URL_HOME*
    The URL to your Admin Index-Site.
    Default: /admin/
